data.eml:eml: Records of Limoniidae and Pediciidae (Diptera) from Armenia, with the first Armenian checklist of these families

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oboňa, Jozef, Stary, Jaroslav, Manko, Peter, Hrivniak, Ľubos, Papyan, Levon (2016): Records of Limoniidae and Pediciidae (Diptera) from Armenia, with the first Armenian checklist of these families. ZooKeys 585: 125-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.585.8330, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.585.8330
